data.text: @MikeCampbellHQ Hope for a speedy recovery for your mates and crew. And that no one else falls ill. Lookin forward to April. X🌻❤
@MikeCampbellHQ Love the new album..looking forward to Nashville after waiting 2 years!
@MikeCampbellHQ Flights and hotel easily rescheduled. My concert fun now extended to May. Best wishes for an easy recovery.
@MikeCampbellHQ Ugh... what a bummer.... sorry you guys are dealing with that.... hope everyone is ok.... We were SO EXCITED for this show again... Lets do this in may!
@MikeCampbellHQ Syay well.   The tour will get on the road again

@MikeCampbellHQ It's OK MC and DKs. Gainesville was going to be Rainsville⛈, so the delay is fine. I've re-scheduled for Hogtown in May. Sending out heal-fast mojo and safe travels for your tour group. Chomp Chomp 🐊🐊🐊🧡💙
@MikeCampbellHQ Wanna Like the posting, but can't. Still like the band & can't wait for May. Wishing a quick & complete recovery.
@MikeCampbellHQ So sorry to hear this, I hope everyone's alright. Don't worry, it's totally understandable these days. Rock on!
